poison.name: Poison
poison.description: Poison. You know. The death liquid. Warning: DO NOT DRINK.

baditem.name: Bad Item
baditem.description: This a bad, bad item. This will DEFINITELY harm you. This deals quite a punch too. You just consume and watch. This will be the last thing that you will ever attempt!

on_consume.feedback: Wha-chkow! This was a very very bad item, and now you've had it. Enjoy you life, while you can!
